The following are the list of data files that this page is designed to back up.

  • Academic term database file
  • Academic session database file
  • Academic report sheet file
  • Academic broadsheet file
  • Academic score files ( PDFs, Word Document and Excel files )
  • Other academic items such as important school records, past exam questions etc.,
